title: Customer Support/Scheduling Assistant
job_overview:
Virtual Assistant – Customer Support & Scheduling for a Cleaning Company in Canada (Remote)
We're a fast-growing residential and commercial cleaning company based in Edmonton, Alberta, and we’re looking for a highly organized and professional Virtual Assistant to join our team.

Responsibilities Include:
- Customer Support & Scheduling
- Responding to client inquiries through phone, text, email, and social media
- Scheduling cleaning appointments, reschedules, and cancellations
- Sending confirmations and reminders to clients
- Communicating with cleaning staff to coordinate job assignments and updates
- Maintaining daily cleaning calendar and ensuring all jobs are properly staffed

Client Communication
- Providing friendly, timely, and professional customer service
- Following up with past clients for feedback or rebooking
- Responding to inquiries from our website, Instagram, Facebook, and Google Business profile

Virtual Assistant Tasks
- Managing inboxes and calendars
- Entering job and client details into our CRM or booking software
- Assisting with light admin tasks or other team follow-ups

Required Skills/Tools
- Excellent spoken and written English
- Experience in customer service, scheduling, or administrative roles
- Strong organizational and time management skills
- Comfortable with tools like Google Calendar, Gmail, Excel, or CRM software

Bonus: Familiarity with cleaning industry or field service software (like Jobber, BookingKoala))

Position Details:
- Remote (work from anywhere)
- Full-time availability (workload is on average 1-5 calls/texts per day)
- Must be available during business hours (Mountain Time)
-$300 - $500 CAD

Please note that this is a newly established company, and as such, the current workload is quite minimal. There may be days when no tasks are required at all. While the position is listed as full-time, the volume of work does not currently reflect a traditional full-time role, and the compensation has been adjusted accordingly.

This role is intended to transition my day-to-day responsibilities so I can focus more on business development. Typical daily tasks include communicating with 1–5 clients via text (and occasionally by phone), using pre-written scripts that can be copied and pasted.

Please share your resume, relevant experience, and a short video or voice note introduction (optional but appreciated). We’re looking for someone reliable, proactive, and friendly—who can grow with us as the company expands.
